MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable in the Dalgairn area and due to access difficulties, we now expect your supply to be restored by 7:30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:39 PM on Thursday, 18 March 2021.
